Title: S5 Ep.206 Rosa Espinal-Perry
Description:
Rosa Espinal-Perry epitomizes a servant leader. She is passionate about people and it shows in every aspect of her life. With 25+ years in learning & development and human resources.  Her industry background is diverse and includes #banking, #telecom, #hospitality, and #workforce development.  Tune into this show to learn more about what she loves about training and learning, her commitment to volunteering, and how she leverages communication and collaboration skills to create synergy across all areas and drive continuous improvement.

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Improving #Skills based #diversity #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
